snippet.title: Reinvent Governance (Roundtable) | Reinvent America
snippet.description:
Taking stock of America in the early 21st century and thinking about how to create the best governing system possible starts with utilizing modern digital technologies.

Participants include: 
Jordan Greenhall - Entrepreneur & Angel Investor
Tanja Aitamurto - Deputy Director of the Brown Institute for Media Innovation at Stanford University
Michel Bauwens - Founder of P2P Foundation
Bret Weinstein - Evolutionary Theorist & Professor at The Evergreen State College
John Robb - Author of "Brave New War"
Jake Dunagan - Global Foresight Lead & Managing Director of verynice.co
Jim Rutt - Former Chairman of Santa Fe Institute 
David Hodgson - Founder of Hummingbird Labs

About this series: American politics is paralyzed and polarized, and many Americans worry that we arenâ€™t moving quickly enough to rise to the many challenges of the 21st-century. This inaugural season of Reinvent America series spanned the gamut of fields that were ripe for reinvention and pulled together can-do innovators who worked in virtual roundtables on next generation ideas about how to solve our most pressing problems.

About Reinvent: Reinvent gathers top innovators in video conversations to fundamentally reinvent our world.
